title: Word Template
description: A *Word Template* is an object that describes the morphological slots in a word.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of object. Must be set to `WordTemplate`.

category.title: Lexical Category
category.description: The lexical category that this Word Template applies to.

inflectionClass.title: Inflection Class
inflectionClass.description: The inflectional class that this Word Template applies to.

morphemeType.title: Morpheme Type
morphemeType.description: The type of morpheme that this Word Template applies to. Examples might be `stem`, `compound`, etc.

name.title: Word Template Name
name.description: The name of this Word Template, optionally in multiple languages.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: A collection of notes about this Word Template.

items.title: Note
items.description: A note about this Word Template.

slots.title: Slots
slots.description: A group of objects describing the slots in this Word Template.

items.title: Slot
items.description: An object representing a single slot in a word template.

name.title: Slot Name
name.description: The name for this slot, optionally in multiple languages.

optional.title: Optional
optional.description: When set to `false`, this field indicates that the slot must be filled.

notes.text: Initials and finals are obligatory; medials are optional. (Caveat: Sometimes a final can be zero.)
Finals determine the lexical category (part of speech) of the stem, and sometimes add additional meaning too.
